sense.gloss: to put someone to work, to make someone work
to use, to apply, to exert, to exercise (restraint, one's imagination, one's brain, etc.)

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓らがその↑少年↑↓しょうねん↓をそんなにきつく↑働↑↓|はたら↓かせる|のは↑残酷↑↓ざんこく↓だ。
sdata.e: It is cruel of them to make the boy work so hard.

sdata.j: その↑部長↑↓ぶちょう↓は、よく↑長時間↑↓ちょうじかん↓↑働↑↓|はたら↓かせる|。
sdata.e: That manager often makes "people" work long hours.
